title.narrative: ASEAN Cooperation Project on the Protection of Intellectual Property Rights (ECAP III)

description.narrative: Specific Objectives:1) To further strengthen the institutional capacity, regional harmonisation of legal and administrative frameworks for the protection of IPRs in the region.2) To enhance enforcement in order to secure IPRs from misuse or unauthorised application.3) To help accelerate the pace and scope of IP asset creation and commercialisation inside and outside ASEAN, particularly in the area of GIs.4) To strengthen the regional university IP network.5) To provide support to ASEAN

title.narrative: Number of ASEAN countries having joined the Madrid Protocol and The Hague Agreement (Geneva Act) during project implementation

title.narrative: Number of ASEAN countries having joined the Madrid Protocol and The Hague Agreement (Geneva Act) during project implementation

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
